00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : UpdateF
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)

00028 
00029  SUBROUTINE UpdateF
00030 
00031 ! Common Variables
00032  USE Domain,      ONLY : ni, ni_f, xmax, xmin, ymax, ymin
00033  USE FluidParams, ONLY : p, p_f, u, u_f
00034  IMPLICIT NONE
00035 
00036 ! Local Variables
00037  INTEGER :: i, j
00038  INTEGER :: xs1, xs2, xt1, xt2, xt3, ys1, ys2, yt1, yt2, yt3
00039 
00040 
00041  DO j = ymin, ymax-1
00042    DO i = xmin, xmax-1
00043 
00044 ! Coordinates of source nodes for the interpolation (xs,ys)
00045      xs1 = i
00046      ys1 = j
00047      xs2 = ni(i,j,1)
00048      ys2 = ni(i,j,2)
00049 
00050 ! Coordinates of target nodes for the interpolation (xt,yt)
00051      xt1 = 2*i - 1
00052      yt1 = 2*j - 1
00053      xt2 = ni_f(xt1,yt1,1)
00054      yt2 = ni_f(xt1,yt1,2)
00055      xt3 = ni_f(xt2,yt2,1)
00056      yt3 = ni_f(xt2,yt2,2)
00057  
00058 ! Target 1
00059      u_f(xt1,yt1,1) = u(xs1,ys1,1)
00060      u_f(xt1,yt1,2) = u(xs1,ys1,2)
00061      p_f(xt1,yt1)   = p(xs1,ys1)
00062 
00063 ! Target 2
00064      u_f(xt2,yt1,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys1,1) )
00065      u_f(xt2,yt1,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys1,2) )
00066      p_f(xt2,yt1)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys1) + p(xs2,ys1) )
00067 
00068 ! Target 3
00069      u_f(xt3,yt1,1) = u(xs2,ys1,1)
00070      u_f(xt3,yt1,2) = u(xs2,ys1,2)
00071      p_f(xt3,yt1)   = p(xs2,ys1)
00072 
00073 ! Target 4
00074     u_f(xt1,yt2,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs1,ys2,1) )
00075     u_f(xt1,yt2,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs1,ys2,2) )
00076     p_f(xt1,yt2)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys1) + p(xs1,ys2) )
00077 
00078 ! Target 5
00079     u_f(xt2,yt2,1) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys1,1) + u(xs1,ys2,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00080     u_f(xt2,yt2,2) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys1,2) + u(xs1,ys2,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00081     p_f(xt2,yt2)   = 0.25D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys1)   + p(xs1,ys2)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00082 
00083 ! Target 6
00084     u_f(xt3,yt2,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs2,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00085     u_f(xt3,yt2,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs2,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00086     p_f(xt3,yt2)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs2,ys1) + p(xs2,ys2) )
00087 
00088 ! Target 7
00089     u_f(xt1,yt3,1) = u(xs1,ys2,1)
00090     u_f(xt1,yt3,2) = u(xs1,ys2,2)
00091     p_f(xt1,yt3)   = p(xs1,ys2)
00092 
00093 ! Target 8
00094     u_f(xt2,yt3,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys2,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00095     u_f(xt2,yt3,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys2,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00096     p_f(xt2,yt3)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys2) + p(xs2,ys2) )
00097 
00098 ! Target 9
00099     u_f(xt3,yt3,1) = u(xs2,ys2,1)
00100     u_f(xt3,yt3,2) = u(xs2,ys2,2)
00101     p_f(xt3,yt3)   = p(xs2,ys2)
00102 
00103    END DO
00104  END DO
00105 
00106  RETURN
00107  END SUBROUTINE UpdateF
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:02:43 2008 for LL-2D-DGR by  1.5.6
